answers.answer: I have heard that recurrent yeast infections could mean that you have diabetes. But, it may just be coincidence or your immune system being down right now. Make sure that you dry your feet thoroughly after every shower and anytime your feet sweat. Best of luck to you.

question: I seem to have contracted a yeast infection and moccasin type athletes foot at the same time... I live a relatively average life generally free of health problems... I had a yeast infection once years before, and I've never had athletes foot before. I was wondering if it could be an indication of something else; possibly something more severe? Or if they're related? Or if anyone has experienced anything similar?Any input would be appreciated.
title: yeast infection and.... athletes foot?
